entries.journal_entry_description: A courier with information for Inquisitor Redge has gone missing. Find the courier and retrieve the information he was delivering.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: A courier with information for Inquisitor Redge has gone missing. Speak with the courier's contact, Rogan Fel, in Bela Vistal on Corellia.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You discover that the courier was mugged and robbed of his delivery. He has been hiding out fearing retribution from Inquisitor Redge. Go speak with him.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The muggers who robbed the courier, known as the gravestone bandits, have set up a meeting with some Rebels to sell them the information the courier held. Crash their meeting.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Return to Loam Redge at the Emperor's Retreat
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Defeat the Rebel commander, Major Zyyacah Kolzaar.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Eliminate Rebel troops at the meet.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Defeat the Leader of the gravestone bandits, Macz Cynthisa.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Destroy those who dared to interfere with an Imperial courier.
